name: Soltec Computer Systems
overview:
Soltec are a software development house which provide solutions using microsoft, sage and dell technologies, including Dynamics Nav, SharePoint and Web technologies.

Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) For quarter of a century, Soltec has designed, developed and implemented best-of-breed ERP and financial management solutions that provide our customers with improved performance, increased productivity and a significant return on investment. As a solutions provider, we focus exclusively on Microsoft Dynamics NAV ERP solution, which is designed to be familiar to your people, work well with your existing systems, empower people and teams to be more productive, and promote informed decision making.

Web Solutions for all your business needs We provide a range of web solutions to meet our customer’s needs; from a brochure website to complex integrated solutions, taking advantage of powerful web technologies.

We have brought over 25 years of commercial experience in developing bespoke software solutions into creating web solutions which enhance business process and practices giving you a competitive advantage.
